lead_paragraph: Hassan Ali Dhoore, considered an important member of the Shabab security and intelligence wing, had been under U.S. surveillance for some time.

headline.print_headline: Somali Militant Leader Believed Killed in Strike
headline.main: Somali Militant Leader Believed Killed in Drone Strike

snippet: Hassan Ali Dhoore, considered an important member of the Shabab security and intelligence wing, had been under U.S. surveillance for some time.
abstract: Officials say American drone strike in Somalia killed Shabab militant group leader Hassan Ali Dhoore.
